[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@loopback/core](./core.md) &gt; [Component](./core.component.md) &gt; [classes](./core.component.classes.md)

## Component.classes property

A map of classes to be bound to the application context.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
classes?: ClassMap;
```

## Example


```ts
{
  'rest.body-parsers.xml': XmlBodyParser
}

```
